column1: The funeral service will be held Saturday
column2: June 20th at 3:00 p.m. in the chapel of Ronald V. Hall Funeral Home with Reverend Bill Black officiating. Burial will follow in the Moseley Cemetery. The family will receive friends at the funeral home on Sunday afternoon
column3: June 14th from 3:00 until 5:00 and then one hour prior to the service on the following Saturday.
